2452.01.text:
But just to answer the
rest of your question,

2453.95.text:
it is also the case that as
long as we start on a moonshot

2457.71.text:
and we believe that there's
a good return on investment

2460.14.text:
over some very long period of
time, where a reward to risk

2464.15.text:
ratio is good for Google, then
as we go through the process,

2469.55.text:
if you're building
this moonshot for us,

2471.73.text:
I'm going to have a dialogue
with you about how much

2474.04.text:
resources have I given
you and how much have

2477.85.text:
And as long as the
risks are coming

2479.48.text:
down faster than I'm
giving you money,

2481.84.text:
our ROI is actually
getting better.

2484.44.text:
And as long as
that's true, I'm just

2486.27.text:
going to keep handing
you the resources.

2487.94.text:
And if we go the
other way, where

2489.41.text:
I'm giving you more
resources and it's not

2491.16.text:
getting any less risky,
then probably the resources

2495.99.text:
I think I have time
for one or two more.

2505.96.text:

2526.33.text:
if you're interested,
to go look at the blog

2528.16.text:
that we post that we put out
about this is 7 of those 11,

2534.35.text:
I mean not parked on the
side, we were stationary.

2542.98.text:
I don't know what we
could do about that.

2544.69.text:
That's just going
to keep happening.

2545.95.text:
We should expect that to
happen at roughly the rate it's

2548.28.text:
been happening to us
because we can't not

2550.32.text: have a back end to the car.

2553.34.text:
The other four, the
person was driving.

2557.30.text:
Our safety drivers
are pretty miraculous.

2559.14.text:
And they have a much better
record than me or you guys do.

2562.36.text:
But I'm sure we could

2564.76.text:
We have yet to have the

2568.97.text: when any of these have happened.

2570.73.text:
So I don't have more to

2573.03.text: But I guess that's good news.
